name: EchoScribe
description:
EchoScribe is one of the fastest growing medical billing and transcription service providers in the U.S. With roots outside of Philadelphia, PA, our low-cost offering has motivated almost 100 medical practices nation-wide to make the switch from their in-house provider to our outsourced billing and transcription service. Our medical billing professionals expedite your revenue cycles to get you paid more, reduce insurance denials, and improve cash flows.
No matter if we use your practice management system or our own preferred cloud software, we will get you paid. When you trust your medical practice’s billing with EchoScribe, you get a team of experts who will collect every dollar that is owed.
